#include<stdlib.h>
#include<stdio.h>
int main(){
int i,j,n,t;
    long long int avg,min,sum,*c;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    for(i=0;i<t;i++){
        sum = 0 ;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        c =(long long int *)malloc(n*sizeof(long long int));
        scanf("%lld",&c[0]);
        min = sum = c[0];
        for(j=1;j<n;j++) {
            scanf("%lld",&c[j]);
            sum += c[j];
            avg = sum/(j+1);
            if(avg < min) min = avg ;
        }
        printf("%lld\n",min);
        free(c);
    }
return 0;}
